query:
SELECT c.nameEn as category, c.slug, COUNT(p.id) as product_count 
FROM categories c 
LEFT JOIN products p ON c.id = p.categoryId 
GROUP BY c.id, c.nameEn, c.slug 
ORDER BY c.nameEn;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user gjuqDE6BkXEJ8aC.fbd2a1734466 --database VA6tZfdqK6JEcwJnq8qJwL --execute SELECT c.nameEn as category, c.slug, COUNT(p.id) as product_count 
FROM categories c 
LEFT JOIN products p ON c.id = p.categoryId 
GROUP BY c.id, c.nameEn, c.slug 
ORDER BY c.nameEn;
